subject: Re: [junit] If a test fails (on an error), is tearDown called any  way?
msgSnippet: ... Ok, thanks. I guess the problem lies elsewhere. L -- Laurent Duperval  If you re in a vehicle going the speed of light,
messageBody:
On 23 Oct, Di Iorio, Matthew (ISS Atlanta) wrote:
> My mistake. Let's try this again. :)
>
> Yes, if your test code is called then tearDown is always called.
>

Ok, thanks. I guess the problem lies elsewhere.

L

--
Laurent Duperval <mailto:lduperval@...>

If you're in a vehicle going the speed of light, what happens when you
turn on the headlights?
